issue.title: Compulsory SHOP properties not tested
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

When a a property "checkbox" is setted to "compulsory" in backend, the test is not done in front-end (if the user do not check at least one property, he still can validate the properties).

--> check on compulsory should be done

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Seen with this defect #1205
